pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:0.5.eng: The training rule on twelve years of seniority

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.1.eng: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.2.eng: At that time nuns who had twelve years of seniority were giving the full admission without being approved by the Sangha.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.4.pli: na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.4.eng: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.5.eng: And their students too were ignorant and incompetent,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.6.pli: na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.6.eng: and they too did not know what was allowable and what was not.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.7.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.7.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.8.pli: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.8.eng: “How can nuns who have twelve years of seniority give the full admission without being approved by the Sangha?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.9.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.9.eng: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.12.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpessanti.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.15.eng: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.16.eng: “Monks, approval is required for a nun who has twelve years of seniority to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.17.eng: And the approval is to be given like this.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.18.pli: Tāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.18.eng: After approaching the Sangha of nuns, that nun who has twelve years of seniority should arrange her upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the senior nuns. She should then squat on her heels, raise her joined palms, and say:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.19.pli: ‘ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.19.eng: ‘Venerables, I, the nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority, ask the Sangha for approval to give the full admission.’

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.20.eng: And she should ask a second

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.22.pli: Sā bhikkhunī saṅghena paricchinditabbā— ‘byattāyaṃ bhikkhunī lajjinī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.22.eng: The Sangha should then decide whether that nun is competent and has a sense of conscience.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.23.pli: Sace bālā ca hoti alajjinī ca, na dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.23.eng: If she is ignorant and shameless, approval should not be given.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.24.pli: Sace bālā hoti lajjinī, na dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.24.eng: If she is ignorant but has a sense of conscience, approval should not be given.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.25.pli: Sace byattā hoti alajjinī, na dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.25.eng: If she is competent but shameless, approval should not be given.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.26.pli: Sace byattā ca hoti lajjinī ca, dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.26.eng: If she is competent and has a sense of conscience, approval should be given.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.27.eng: And it is to be given like this.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.28.eng: A competent and capable nun should inform the Sangha:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.29.eng: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.30.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.30.eng: The nun so-and-so, who has twelve years of seniority, is asking the Sangha for approval to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.31.pli: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.31.eng: If the Sangha is ready, it should give approval to nun so-and-so, who has twelve years of seniority, to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.33.eng: Please, Venerables, I ask the Sangha to listen.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.34.pli: Ayaṃ itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṅghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.34.eng: The nun so-and-so, who has twelve years of seniority, is asking the Sangha for approval to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.35.pli: Saṅgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.35.eng: The Sangha gives approval to nun so-and-so, who has twelve years of seniority, to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.36.pli: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.36.eng: Any nun who approves of giving approval to nun so-and-so, who has twelve years of seniority, to give the full admission should remain silent.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.37.eng: Any nun who doesn’t approve should speak up.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.38.pli: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammuti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.38.eng: The Sangha has given approval to nun so-and-so, who has twelve years of seniority, to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.39.pli: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.39.eng: The Sangha approves and is therefore silent. I’ll remember it thus.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.40.pli: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.40.eng: Then, after rebuking those nuns in many ways, the Buddha spoke in dispraise of being difficult to support …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.41.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.41.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.42.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṅghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.42.1.eng: ‘If a nun who has twelve years of seniority gives the full admission without approval from the Sangha, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.5.eng: Who has twelve years of seniority:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.6.eng: who has reached twelve years of seniority.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.8.pli: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhāpanasammuti na dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.8.eng: approval to give the full admission has not been given though a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.11.pli: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.11.eng: If, intending to give the full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastery zone, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.12.eng: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.12.comm: The Pali just says dukkaṭa, without specifying that it is an āpatti, “an offense”. Yet elsewhere, such as at Bu Ss 10:2.65, the dukkaṭa is annulled if you commit the full offense of saṅghādisesa. The implication is that in these contexts dukkaṭa should be read as āpatti dukkaṭassa, “an offense of wrong conduct”.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.13.eng: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.14.eng: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.15.pli: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.15.eng: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.16.1.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.17.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.18.eng: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she gives the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.19.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.20.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.21.eng: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.23.eng: if she has twelve years of seniority, has been approved by the Sangha, and then gives the full admission;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.25.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.26.eng: The fifth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.2.eng: the nun Caṇḍakāḷī approached the Sangha of nuns and asked for approval to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.3.pli: Atha kho bhikkhunisaṅgho caṇḍakāḷiṃ bhikkhuniṃ paricchinditvā—

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.4.pli: “alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā”ti, vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ na adāsi.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.6.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhunisaṅgho aññāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.6.eng: Soon afterwards the Sangha of nuns gave approval to other nuns to give the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.8.eng: “So it seems I’m ignorant and shameless,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.9.pli: yaṃ saṅgho aññāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti, mayhameva na detī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.9.eng: since the Sangha gives approval to other nuns, but not to me.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.10.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.10.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.12.pli: ‘alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā’ti vuccamānā ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.12.eng: consent to not being approved to give the full admission, and then criticize it afterwards?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.13.pli: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī ‘alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā’ti vuccamānā ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.13.eng: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī did this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.17.pli: ‘alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā’ti vuccamānā ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjissati.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.19.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.19.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.20.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī—‘alaṃ tāva te, ayye, vuṭṭhāpitenā’ti vuccamānā ‘sādhū’ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:1.20.1.eng: ‘If a nun is told, “Venerable, you’ve given enough full admissions for now,” and she consents, saying, “Fine,” but then criticizes it afterwards, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.5.eng: “Venerable, you’ve given enough full admissions for now”:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.6.eng: “Venerable, you’ve given enough full ordinations for now.”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.7.pli: “Sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.1.7.eng: If she consents, saying, “Fine,” but then criticizes it afterwards, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.2.pli: pakatiyā chandā dosā mohā bhayā karontaṃ khiyyati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.2.eng: if she criticizes one who regularly acts out of favoritism, ill will, confusion, or fear;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.4.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc76:2.2.5.eng: The sixth training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:0.5.eng: The training rule on not giving the full admission to trainee nuns

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā sikkhamānā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.2.eng: a trainee nun went to the nun Thullanandā and asked her for the full ordination.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.4.pli: “sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.4.eng: “If you give me a robe, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission.” But she neither gave her the full admission nor made any effort to have her fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.5.pli: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.5.eng: That trainee nun told the nuns what had happened.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.6.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.6.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.7.eng: “How could Venerable Thullanandā say that to a trainee nun

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.8.pli: ‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.8.eng: and then neither give her the full admission nor make any effort to have her fully admitted?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.9.eng: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.10.pli: ‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotī”ti?

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.13.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.13.eng: “How could the nun Thullanandā act in this way?

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.14.pli: ‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.16.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.16.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.17.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ—‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.17.1.eng: ‘If a nun tells a trainee nun, “If you give me a robe, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission,” but she then neither gives her the full admission nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted, then, if there were no obstacles, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.6.eng: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.7.pli: Sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmīti
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.7.eng: If you give me a robe, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.8.eng: I’ll give you the full ordination.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.9.eng: Then, if there were no obstacles:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.11.eng: She neither gives her the full admission:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.12.eng: does not herself give her the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.13.eng: Nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.14.eng: does not ask anyone else to give her the full ordination.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.15.pli: “Neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.15.eng: If she thinks, “I’ll neither give her the full admission nor make any effort to have her fully admitted,” then by the mere fact of abandoning her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.2.3.eng: if she searches for someone to give her the full ordination, but is unable to find anyone;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.2.7.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.2.8.eng: The seventh training rule is finished.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:0.3.eng: The chapter on offenses entailing confession

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:0.5.eng: The second training rule on not giving the full admission to trainee nuns

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.1.pli: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.1.eng: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.2.pli: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā sikkhamānā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.2.eng: a trainee nun went to the nun Thullanandā and asked for the full ordination.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.3.pli: Thullanandā bhikkhunī taṃ sikkhamānaṃ “sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.3.eng: Thullanandā told her, “If you follow me for two years, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission.” But she neither gave her the full admission nor made any effort to have her fully admitted.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.4.pli: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.4.eng: That trainee nun told the nuns what had happened.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.5.pli: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.5.eng: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.6.eng: “How could Venerable Thullanandā say that to a trainee nun

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.7.pli: ‘sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.7.eng: and then neither give her the full admission nor make any effort to have her fully admitted?” …

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.8.eng: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.9.pli: ‘sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotī”ti?

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.12.pli: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.12.eng: “How could the nun Thullanandā act in this way?

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.13.pli: ‘sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.15.pli: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.15.eng: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.16.1.pli: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ— ‘sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:1.16.1.eng: ‘If a nun tells a trainee nun, “If you follow me for two years, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission,” but she then neither gives her the full admission nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted, then, if there were no obstacles, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.4.eng: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.6.eng: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.7.pli: Sace maṃ tvaṃ, ayye, dve vassāni anubandhissasīti
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.7.eng: “If you follow me for two years, Venerable”:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.8.eng: if you attend on me for two twelve-month periods.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.10.eng: I’ll give you the full ordination.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.11.eng: Then, if there were no obstacles:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.13.eng: She neither gives her the full admission:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.14.eng: she does not herself give her the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.15.eng: Nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted:

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.16.eng: she does not ask anyone else to give her the full admission.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.17.pli: “Neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.17.eng: If she thinks, “I’ll neither give her the full admission nor make any effort to have her fully admitted,” then by the mere fact of abandoning her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.20.eng: if she searches for someone to give her the full ordination, but is unable to find anyone;

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.24.eng: if she is the first offender.

pli-tv-bi-vb-pc78:2.25.eng: The eighth training rule is finished.
